subject: Discrimination
Blacks
UEFA Champions League (Soccer)
Race and Ethnicity
World Cup 2018 (Soccer)
Soccer
lead_paragraph: Yaya Touré, a player from Ivory Coast, said that black players might boycott the World Cup in 2018 if the country did not curb abuse by fans.
snippet: Yaya Touré, a player from Ivory Coast, said that black players might boycott the World Cup in 2018 if the country did not curb abuse by fans.
